data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in West Tripura, Tripura, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of West Tripura, Tripura, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of West Tripura to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in West Tripura, Tripura, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of West Tripura prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Marma people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Marma people know you.
Spirit, help every believer in West Tripura, Tripura, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of West Tripura.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in West Tripura, Tripura, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: West Tripura
